resources.string: The Wear app was tested on a Moto 360 second generation (round). Square watches were only tested in emulator. For issues and feedback, the project can be found on GitHub.
The data used to present all traffic information is based on information retrieved from Trafiklab.se
Add your favourite stations and desired modes of transport. \n\nThe matching current departures will show up on your watch.
